GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
pstore/zone: Use GFP_ATOMIC to allocate zone buffer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 44cf50587e822714f52ceeadd16b6c38d1b29d0f, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 335426c6dcdd338d6b7c939c2da15fc9c5dd4959. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: pstore/zone: Use GFP_ATOMIC to allocate zone buffer
